attributes.contentHtml:
Do you want to discuss drama in a better place?
Do you want to discuss stuff other than drama?

EXYQ, by the creators of drama.gg, is open!

https://youtu.be/0SrNP1j49Ik

Feel free to sign up at exyq.com!

Firstly, I would like to express my gratitude to the original authors of this information, as I have copied it from other threads. As previously mentioned, Robert grew increasingly frustrated with the presence of children and memes on this platform, like exposure of "SpermNodes" for allegedly "abusing" providers like GCP/AWS/Oracle/[insert provider]. This is the main motivation behind the creation of this thread. Therefore, I kindly request that you read this carefully before posting, as failure to do so may result in your own banishment from the platform.

Dear all,

It is with deep sadness that I must convey the heartbreaking news of the tragic passing of Sloth/Michael, the owner of Drama.gg and Exyq, this past Sunday. A friend of Michael, zomka, was notified by the Berlin police recently, confirming his death. My heartfelt sympathies go out to all who had the privilege of knowing him.

May he find eternal peace. 🕊

For those in disbelief (watch at your own discretion):

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FFrH9KQoZL8

A random guy contacted me out of the blue, asking me to join his discord server FusionNodes, even though I already had a job with a hosting service in my bio. He kept asking for donations and promised a "free" VPS, which is a shitty VPS at 2.28$ (the min donation amount). I decided to join his server to check it out, and his verification system wasn't working. He didn't have any pricing, privacy policy, or ToS

I acted like I didn't know much and asked about the server CPU he was using. He said he hadn't decided on a CPU and didn't have a budget. He bragged about being rich and then gave away the scam by saying "Oracle has free servers right?" and said he was using donations to start a hosting service from scratch. He also asked me where to get free VPSes.

then his "IRL friend" dm'd and told me that the scammer dude was only 13 years old and trying to scam kids.

if anyone here knows how to take down fraud servers like these without Discord support taking 2 years I'd appreciate the help.

Proofs:

Hello. Probably everyone knows it by now but I will say anyways.
My friends saw a host called PylexNodes. Today I saw an annoucement saying that ALL nodes are offline, this happend multiple times before and major downtime was happening every month.
So I decided to send a message "imagine abusing aws" and got banned few SECONDS after.
This is just a warn for anyone that uses Pylex or plans on doing so, be aware that they only earn off you watching ads and your data can always be lost (backup as often as you can if you really can't switch to a proper hosting)
why?

Something unique doesn't always work, like what the fuck is a "Demon" Host? or CozeCloud? Where is the underlying meaning of the names...

Also, don't just pick a noun and add nodes/servers/VM to it. Fx BuyVM; Started very early, one of a few places where buying virtual servers was very accessible without bunch of KYC. (Please correct me if I'm wrong)

Thanks.

hosting is located on a domain: justnodes.fun
Below are screenshots about proof of abuse of Google cloud

Black PR, a raid on another hosting was used to attract other users:

Evidence of PR message:

Evidence that they pinged twinks

Children think that they are grandfathers when in fact the billing was turned off.

Proof to message technical service (Billing)

I recommend not using abusive hosting, especially when children manage the hosting.

Hello, I was a friend of Wajfay till 2022 June, let's take this to his early hostings, such as ownodes.org, I was a CEO there, he was so kinda a scumbag such as spamming and typing all in caps, an example:

Also totally a professional at hostings



Afterwards, I blocked him and it was for about 2 months, after unblocking everything was fine. He had a new hosting nighspeed.com (the reviews of it, even has an alert "We’ve detected a number of fake reviews for this company and we’ve removed them."). On 11 November 2022, we found out he was redistributing our addon to other members, so we decided to get rid of him completly, afterwards he came here and made a thread. In the thread he was admitting to leaking the addon, ddosing us and drama.gg and making up an alt - Mubeeeen & newtonzz to cover up the evidence. That fortunatly didn't work for them and there was nothing heard back. Till his new hosting is here wajpad.club. When we recently heard about it, we were suprised on how much he really abuses. First seeing it, he was using deinserverhost.de, he was making the counts so high which is obviously not true

Anyways after so long, it is gone from deinserverhost.de (confirmation of it (saved page)) but not totally, now he is using Hetzner (proof), now it is a waiting game for the end of him

Some other screenshots


Shoutout to staff at drama.gg and deinserverhost.de

xeroz.tech was good only for 2 months.
I first had a vps with them in India location for my Minecraft server and it ran well. It often overloaded as I ran multiple servers and it pretty much just lagged my Minecraft server and nothing much.
Later I renewed the VPS to start a MC hosting so I could provide Minecraft servers in India.
Here are some pics before I explain



he repeatedly blamed us for the often crashes

I even showed him that we're not using much CPU and something is triggering high CPU from their side

I told him this yet he never replied to this

I knew he was lying as I ran 3-4 Minecraft servers previously before starting a host and they all used nearly 600%+ and even on overload they never crashed, they basically used to just get laggy and kick all players like every normal server.
We had multiple crashes
This is where it happened

Our VPS went down for over 2 weeks and at the first day I asked for priority support and said I was interested in paying but he never replied back on that

he asked for my vps IP and never replied back regarding it, later when I tried to get back he claims he isn't free on weekends.
Later I contact him the next day and he claims to be on a break!
Before I continue let me tell you that he did some changes to the vps panel the before day which resulted in many of the vps clients having their services down and what does he do about it? HE GOES ON A LITERAL VACATION!

He doesn't even care about his customers!
He later says he blocked my sys admin when we were literally stressed about our Minecraft host as our clients were complaining about the service being offline. I was at my worst at that time as it was very depressing.

He later talks about compensation if the issue wasn't fixed in a week

he then says "If its not fixed this week it will be 2 months."
I was pretty fine with that, I tried to move on and understand him and waited.
Guess what...
I never received the required help

and when I ask about the compensation, he shows attitude saying "Don't know what you are trying to get by dmming me, e-mail aiden@xeroz.tech directly"
That was the last convo we had with Patric/wicktor.

Now aiden. I really thought he wanted to help but he was just wasting our time.
He asked me for the vps IP and I provide it to him and then he says this

very funny ^^
I show him a pic of the IP and then he decides to not reply for 2 days

then he says this

Not helpful guys
Now he literally tells us to reinstall!!

Now that's just bad company service, I was ASSURED that there would be 0% dataloss

yet it happened.
I reply back showing him that I'm unable to ssh into the vps and he tells me to try again!

Now here's the funny part

My VPS is suspended as the bill was overdue as I didn't pay for it at that time. I'm gonna tell you what I told him.

  • I was promised 2 months compensation
  • The vps was down for 2 weeks so I've been waiting for a fix and compensation so I didn't pay it.
    Now he starts talking about the invoice where Patrick/wicktor had created a new invoice for me in the past so I can renew the vps and use it to start my mc host

I thought he was talking about the present invoice and I tell him that I was promised compensation so give it to me

Now he starts talking about the old expired invoice again

I finally understand at that time and explained to him here so he can understand

Here's the ultimate scam, He gives me only 17 days compensation, not what patrick agreed to give.
He pretty much just asks for the IP & pass & ignores me after that.

ItzAwesome, Famous isn't he?

Hey everyone! This thread is for those who are new to hosting and want to set up their own server on an unknown 24/7 server hosting provider. First of all, let's check the IPs of your hosting provider to see which hosting they are using. Providers like Contabo and Azure often offer free trial nodes, so let's discuss what free trials are.

Free trials are like test runs for a limited period, usually ranging from 1 to 12 months, during which you can try out a hosting service without committing to a long-term payment plan. It's like checking out a demo of a website before you decide to buy or use it.

However, be cautious of hosting providers that frequently experience data loss either monthly or every 2 to 3 months. This could be a sign of scammers who abuse nodes and engage in illegal practices to obtain the hosting node. Unfortunately, I can't provide specific names, but be aware of common groups like rus.js, qlox, duck, and others who have been involved in such activities since 2021.

To ensure your data is safe and your hosting experience is smooth, it's best to use reputable and paid hosting services. While free trials might seem attractive, paid hosting offers more reliability and support, reducing the risk of data loss or other issues.

Stay safe and make informed choices when selecting a hosting provider. Remember, it's better to pay for quality service than to risk data loss and headaches with unreliable or suspicious hosts.
